Package edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course

Class Activity

java.lang.Object
edu.ncsu.csc216.pack_scheduler.course.Activity
All Implemented Interfaces:
Conflict
Direct Known Subclasses:
Course
public abstract class Activity extends Object implements Conflict
Activity super class of Course that creates an Activity and sets the course's title, meeting days, starting times, and ending times.
Author:
Fahad Ansari, Niyati Patel

      startTime - starting time of the Activity

    • setMeetingDaysAndTime

      public void setMeetingDaysAndTime(String meetingDays, int startTime, int endTime)
      Sets the Activity's meeting days, starting time, and ending time. If the Activity's meeting days are arranged, then the starting and ending time will both be set to 0.
      Parameters:
      meetingDays - meeting days to set
      startTime - start time to set
      endTime - end time to set
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if meeting days are null or an empty string
      IllegalArgumentException - if starting time is greater than ending time
      IllegalArgumentException - if starting time has an hour greater than 23 or less than 0 and if the starting time has minutes greater than 59 or less than 0.
      IllegalArgumentException - if ending time has an hour greater than 23 or less than 0 and if the ending time has minutes greater than 59 or less than 0.

    • checkConflict

      public void checkConflict(Activity possibleConflictingActivity) throws ConflictException
      Checks whether a selected activity wanting to be added conflicts with another activity already in the schedule
      Specified by:
      checkConflict in interface Conflict
      Parameters:
      possibleConflictingActivity - the activity being checked if it conflicts with another activity in the schedule
      Throws:
      ConflictException - if both activities conflict with each other

    • getMeetingString

      public String getMeetingString()
      Return the string format for the meeting days of the course along with the times if the meeting days are not arranged. If the meeting days are arranged, only the meeting days string is returned.
      Returns:
      a string of the meeting days.
